metadata.title: CVE-2023-52602 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: jfs:fix slab-out-of-bounds Read in dtSearch Currently while searching forcurrent page in the sorted entry table of the page there is a out of boundaccess. Added a bound check to fix the error. Dave: Set return code to -EIO

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
